attributes.action: Make religious discrimination online a criminal offence.
attributes.background: Religious discrimination online is a big issue in today's society, we live in a multicultural society however, many people find loop holes through religious discrimination being a criminal offence. They go online and become anonymous, we should do more to stop this!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It is already illegal to discriminate against people on grounds of religion. You can find out more about that here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/discrimination-because-of-race-religion-or-belief/discrimination-because-of-religion-or-belief/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government and Parliament to make it illegal to provide anonymous online accounts.
